markdownRemark.excerpt: syncpack is a tool that helps us detect and fix varied dependencies across our packages. Unless you’ve been really observant or you haven’t been copying/pasting…
markdownRemark.html:
syncpack is a tool that helps us detect and fix varied dependencies across our packages. Unless you’ve been really observant or you haven’t been copying/pasting out of the course notes, you may have a few versions of TypeScript in this project. Let’s detect and fix that

Install it

sh
pnpm i -D syncpack@alpha

Run the checker

sh
pnpm syncpack lint

And auto-fix any issues you may find

sh
pnpm syncpack fix

If you want opinionated formatting of your package.json files, you can run

sh
pnpm syncpack format

frontmatter.title: Consolidating External Dependencies
frontmatter.description: We'll use syncpack to rally our monorepo around a single version of each external dependency
